certs.description: This is an overview of the certificates returned by this url

delegation.description: Indicates domain name delegation with and without the www prefix:
values: Delegation is set for non-prefixed access
Delegation is set for prefixed access

duration.description: The assessment of this endpoint took:

gradeTrustIgnored.note: Trust issue have been ignored when computing this grade.

hasWarnings.note: Indicates  this endpoint has warnings that might affect the score (e.g., get A- instead of A).

isExceptional.note: This flag will be raised when an exceptional configuration is encountered. The SSL Labs test will give such sites an A+.

isPublic.note: Determines if this assessment is (publicly) visible on www.ssllabls.com website

serverName.note: Server name retrieved via reverse DNS

startTime.note: Time at which the scan was started
